definition: variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Their victims from the feudal system, become the accomplices of the feudal rulers.
sentences.chinese: 她们由封建制度的受害者，变成封建统治者的帮凶。

sentences.english: Somehow, we are all complicit in her ruination .
sentences.chinese: 也不知怎的，我们每人都是她毁容的帮凶。

sentences.english: It is the accomplice of Japanese invaders to carry out ideological enslavement activities in enemy-occupied area.
sentences.chinese: 它是日本侵略者在沦陷区实行思想奴化活动的帮凶。

sentences.english: La Boétie notes that the tyrant and his chiefs rarely live out their natural ends.
sentences.chinese: 拉博埃蒂指出暴君以及他的主要帮凶很少活到天年。

sentences.english: I do think, however, that tyranny requires an environment of collusion.
sentences.chinese: 但是我也认为，暴政需要帮凶才能成事。

sentences.english: We shall strike hard, without flinching, at terrorists and those who abet them.
sentences.chinese: 我们要毫不退缩地严厉打击恐怖分子及其帮凶。

sentences.english: She was her husband's accomplice in murdering a rich old man.
sentences.chinese: 她是她丈夫谋杀一个老富翁的帮凶。

sentences.english: When a crime was in quest of arms, they under-let their accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 当一件犯罪行为在寻找助力，他们便转租帮凶。

definition: lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
criminal ringleader/chief culprit/fig. cause of a problem
to act as accomplice to the tiger/to help a villain do evil (idiom)
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
